content:
Software Development … via the Web

  • Advantages of leveraging the Web for software development:

    • Geographic distribution: Software development artifacts can be accessed via the network
    • Use the browser: Ubiquitous browsers can easily view development artifacts
    • Leverage existing infrastructure: Many tools already use the Web
    • Builds on open standards: Web standards are open, yielding many suppliers, often open source, for components. Keeps infrastructure costs low.
